title: Can't reconnect to a game that doesn't exist!
body:
I'm not sure if this is a bug! 
So, i played a pvp Game and my team won, as it showed the victory sign on my screen my league just closed by itself! So the next day i open my league and sign in and a message appears that i have abandoned a game. As frustrated as i was that i had to reconnect when the game had finished long ago, the game would crash and bring me back to the reconnect stage!  Before this i had to update my directX and reinstall league just to get it working from an DirectX error.  Over and over i tried reconnecting but there was no game to reconnect to. Once i had closed my league on the victory screen, when i had opened it up it would show with the statistics of the game.. i did not leave a game and i am not guilty of it~~~~ {{champion:201}}  and i used Braum Support, which went epic for me!!!

replies.body:
Hey Bremo,

This is probably a visual glitch. If it reoccurs, please try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article), and hopefully it won't happen again.
